page.title: 14Social Concerns - Harborne
page.content: Litter & vandalism are two of the main social concerns in our area. Vandals make our area look a mess. They wreck anything they can for pleasure, for kicks or just because they are bored. Examples of vandalism were;- writing on sides of houses, garages, lamposts; broken road signs, broken or carved trees & telephone boxes smashed. Vandalism could be reduced if parents brought their children up to have more respect for property, older people & themselves. Our main shopping centre is very untidy & full of litter. We found sweet wrappings, chip papers etc. thrown on the floor, although litter-bins were provided.There were plastic bags of rubbish in hedgerows.
